往.definition: to go (in a direction); to; towards; (of a train) bound for; past; previous

往事如風.definition: the past is vanished like the wind; gone beyond recall

往來.definition: dealings; contacts; to go back and forth

往前.definition: (in) the past; ahead; forward; in the future

往古.definition: in former times; in olden days

往年.definition: in former years; in previous years

往往.definition: usually; in many cases; more often than not

往後.definition: from now on; in the future; time to come

往復.definition: to go and come back; to make a return trip; backwards and forwards (e.g. of piston or pump action); to reciprocate (of machine part)

往復運動.definition: backwards and forwards action (e.g. of piston or pump); reciprocating motion

往心裡去.definition: to take sth to heart; to take sth seriously

往歲.definition: in former years; in olden days

往生.definition: to be reborn; to live in paradise (Buddhism); to die; (after) one's death

往程.definition: outbound leg (of a bus or train journey etc)

往臉上抹黑.definition: to bring shame to; to smear; to disgrace

往返.definition: to go back and forth; to go to and fro; to do a round trip

往還.definition: to contact; to have dealings (with sb)
